      Parameters:
      grid - of the player

    • updateGrid

      public void updateGrid(String[][] grid)
      The method copies the image of a selected tile from its original position (Tile1, Tile2 or Tile3) and places it in the player grid based on the last_col column and the row calculated by lastTile[last_col]
      Parameters:
      grid - of the player
